EmailTemplate.name: 12-13-21 62/64 Campaign Email 2.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: New blog: 5 top tips for successful cash recycling
EmailTemplate.textOnly: The key to success during any new technology rollout is customer adoption. Let’s face it—if customers don’t use the new self-service technologies, you won’t see the ROI benefits you want. Communication, signage and support are all key in successfully rolling out new self-service technologies such as cash recycling ATMs. Explore our top five tips for maximizing customer adoption and enhancing the customer experience. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
